    • getVariableRelativeIndex

      public int getVariableRelativeIndex(CcddClassesDataTable.Variable application, List<CcddClassesDataTable.Variable> applications)
      Get the index at which the specified application should be inserted in the list of applications provided. The application tree is used to determine the target application's position relative to the applications in the list (if any)
      Specified by:
      getVariableRelativeIndex in interface CcddSchedulerInputInterface
      Parameters:
      application - Application for which to determine the insertion index
      applications - List of applications into which the application is to be inserted
      Returns:
      Index at which to insert the target application
